00008 #ifndef FORMMATRIX_H_
00009 #define FORMMATRIX_H_

00011 #include "../basis_set/basis.h"
00012 #include "../Utility/misc.h"
00013 #include "../Utility/random_generator.h"
00014 #include "../IO/binaryIO.h"
00015 
00016 /* this InteractionData struct contains no information about the size of the lattice*/
00017 // the lattice geometry information is stored in class LatticeShape
00024 typedef struct {
00025         double onsiteE, hop, dyn;
00026         bool randomHop, randomDyn, randomOnSite;
00027         int maxDistance; // beyond which the interaction is set to zero
00028         unsigned seed;
00029 } InteractionData;
00030 
00031 
00032 
00042 class Interaction {
00043 public:
00044         Interaction(LatticeShape& lattice, InteractionData& interactionData) {
00045                 dim = lattice.getDim();
00046                 seed = interactionData.seed;
00047                 rng.SetSeed(seed);
00048                 if (dim==1) {
00049                         int xsite = lattice.getXmax() + 1;
00050                         maxDistance = interactionData.maxDistance;
00051                         // initialize the hopping matrix
00052                         t = DMatrix::Zero(xsite,xsite);
00053                         if (interactionData.randomHop) {
00054                                 setRandomMatrix(t, interactionData.hop, maxDistance);
00055                         } else {
00056                                 // set all element to constant
00057                                 setConstantMatrix(t, interactionData.hop, maxDistance);
00058                         }
00059 
00060                         // initialize the dynamic matrix
00061                         d = DMatrix::Zero(xsite,xsite);
00062                         if (interactionData.randomDyn) {
00063                                 setRandomMatrix(d, interactionData.dyn, maxDistance);
00064                         } else {
00065                                 // set all element to constant
00066                                 setConstantMatrix(d, interactionData.dyn, maxDistance);
00067                         }
00068 
00069                         // initialize the dynamic matrix
00070                         e = DVector::Zero(xsite);
00071                         if (interactionData.randomOnSite) {
00072                                 setRandomVector(e, interactionData.onsiteE);
00073                         } else {
00074                                 // set all element to constant
00075                                 setConstantVector(e, interactionData.onsiteE);
00076                         }
00077                 } //end of if for dim=1
00078 
00079 
00080         }
00081 
00082         double hop(Basis& basis1, Basis& basis2) {
00083                 double result;
00084                 // for 1D case
00085                 switch (dim) {
00086                 case 1:
00087                         if (basis1[0]==basis2[0]) {
00088                                 result = t(basis1[1], basis2[1]);
00089                         } else if (basis1[1]==basis2[1]) {
00090                                 result = t(basis1[0], basis2[0]);
00091                         } else {
00092                                 result = 0.0;
00093                         }
00094                         break;
00095                 case 2:
00096                 case 3:
00097                 default:
00098                         result = 0.0;
00099                 }
00100                 return result;
00101         }
00102 
00103         double dyn(Basis& basis) {
00104                 double result;
00105                 switch (dim) {
00106                 case 1:
00107                         result = d(basis[0], basis[1]);
00108                         break;
00109                 case 2:
00110                 case 3:
00111                 default:
00112                         result = 0.0;
00113                 }
00114                 return result;
00115         }
00116 
00117         double onsiteE(Basis& basis) {
00118                 double result;
00119                 switch (dim) {
00120                 case 1:
00121                         result = e(basis[0]) +  e(basis[1]);
00122                         break;
00123                 case 2:
00124                 case 3:
00125                 default:
00126                         result = 0.0;
00127                 }
00128                 return result;
00129         }
00130 
00131         // if the seed is not set, use the default one
00132         void setRandomSeed(unsigned inputSeed) {
00133                 seed = inputSeed;
00134                 rng.SetSeed(seed);
00135         }
00136 
00137         // obtain the range of interactions
00138         int getMaxDistance() {
00139                 return maxDistance;
00140         }
00141 
00142         // destructor
00143         ~Interaction() {
00144                 // release the memory of the matrices
00145                 t.resize(0,0);
00146                 d.resize(0,0);
00147                 e.resize(0);
00148         }
00149 
00150 private:
00151         DMatrix t;
00152         DMatrix d;
00153         DVector e;
00154         int maxDistance;
00155         int dim;
00156         unsigned seed;
00157         RandomNumberGenerator rng;
00158 
00159         void setRandomMatrix(DMatrix& m, double maxVal, int maxDistance) {
00160                 int xsite = m.rows();
00161                 for (int i=0; i<xsite-1; ++i) {
00162                         for (int incr=1; incr<=maxDistance && i+incr<xsite; ++incr) {
00163                                 m(i,i+incr) = maxVal*rng.randomReal()/std::pow(incr,3.0); // range [0, hop)
00164                                 m(i+incr,i) = t(i,i+incr);
00165                         }
00166                 }
00167         }
00168 
00169         void setConstantMatrix(DMatrix& m, double maxVal, int maxDistance) {
00170                 int xsite = m.rows();
00171                 for (int i=0; i<xsite-1; ++i) {
00172                         for (int incr=1; incr<=maxDistance && i+incr<xsite; ++incr) {
00173                                 m(i,i+incr) = maxVal/std::pow(incr,3.0); // range [0, hop)
00174                                 m(i+incr,i) = t(i,i+incr);
00175                         }
00176                 }
00177         }
00178 
00179         void setRandomVector(DVector& v, double maxVal) {
00180                 for (int i=0; i<v.size(); ++i) {
00181                         v(i) = maxVal*rng.randomReal();
00182                 }
00183         }
00184 
00185         void setConstantVector(DVector& v, double maxVal) {
00186                 for (int i=0; i<v.size(); ++i) {
00187                         v(i) = maxVal;
00188                 }
00189         }
00190 
00191 };
